title: A Skin A Friend Gifted Me Dissapeared And Now I Have To Repurshase It
body: So I logged in after about maybe a week, way back someone gifted me championship thresh, i play a game it doesn't appear, i go to shop and it says buy, i've had the skin for god knows how long and i want it back??? I main thresh, and i lost the skin i used a lot

replies.body:
Hi,

If something you've purchased / been gifted is missing from your account, I'd suggest you get in touch with player support.

Link: [New Support Request](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Cheers
Mindstar
